title: Your MacBook has a SECRET
description:
Every macOS device has had a copy of the Bitcoin whitepaper on it since 2018.  Why is that?

NEWS SOURCES: 
Apple has allegedly included crypto manifesto, the bitcoin white paper, in every Mac since 2018
https://markets.businessinsider.com/news/currencies/apple-bitcoin-manifesto-mac-white-paper-tech-blogger-markets-crypto-2023-4 

included in every OS version since 10.14 
https://www.coindesk.com/tech/2023/04/06/hidden-inside-macos-the-bitcoin-whitepaper/ 

Apparently it takes a simple terminal command to locate the file https://lmg.gg/Or4zG 

Two hypotheses as to why it is there https://lmg.gg/XbIJH 

First documented time it was discovered: https://twitter.com/schwa23/status/1332594197505798145
Second documented time https://discussions.apple.com/thread/252657375
